definition: a raft made of bamboo or wood/to fell trees/to hew
tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: We Zhangcha knitting factory in the city of quality and service are legendary.
sentences.chinese: 在张槎针织城我们厂的质量和服务是有口皆碑的。

sentences.english: Cha Shan is the birthplace of Taoism.
sentences.chinese: 槎山是道教的重要发祥地。

sentences.english: In fact, the Mad Phoenix is the Foshan Zhangcha people, but two people.
sentences.chinese: 其实，南海十三郎是佛山张槎人，而且是两个人。

sentences.english: Cha Shan mountains at this time like Joan Tower, and disappeared the next.
sentences.chinese: 此时的槎山宛如仙山琼阁，时隐时现。

definition: lit. boat made of lily magnolia wood/poetic term for boat
see 徘徊[pai2 huai2], to dither/to hesitate/to pace back and forth/irresolute
